snippet: The former prime minister of Thailand, Abhisit Vejjajiva, was charged with murder on Thursday for his role in a military crackdown on antigovernment protesters.
abstract: Abhisit Vejjajiva, former prime minister of Thailand, is charged with murder in connection with his role in military crackdown on antigovernment protesters in Bangkok in April and May of 2010.

byline.contributor: Poypiti Amatatham contributed reporting from Bangkok.

lead_paragraph: The former prime minister of Thailand, Abhisit Vejjajiva, was charged with murder on Thursday for his role in a military crackdown on antigovernment protesters.

headline.seo: Thai Ex-Premier Charged With Murder Over Crackdown
headline.main: Thai Ex-Premier Charged With Murder Over Crackdown in 2010
headline.print_headline: Thai Ex-Leader Faces Charge Of Murder Over Crackdown
